abstract: New York Mets are hottest team in baseball, with 11 straight wins, and fans are entering season with unfamiliar confidence; they hope team will gain bragging rights in city and steal away some attention perennially showered on New York Yankees.
lead_paragraph: The team is the hottest in baseball, giving supporters cautious hope that it can wrest control of bragging rights in New York City and capture the attention of the broader public from the Yankees.

headline.main: An Unfamiliar Feeling for Mets Fans: Optimism
headline.print_headline: An Unfamiliar Feeling for Mets Fans: Optimism

snippet: The team is the hottest in baseball, giving supporters cautious hope that it can wrest control of bragging rights in New York City and capture the attention of the broader public from the Yankees.
